mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is an oversized printed piece showing copies of two photographs. One is a portrait photograph of Harry L. Walker. The other is a photograph of his business at 28-30 North Main Street, Lexington, Virginia. This piece is accompanied by a handwritten note which reads, "Harry Lee Walker in Middle with Apron. Master Butcher. Edwin T. Walker leaning on Cart."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Harry L. Walker and Edwin T. Walker (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
Walker, Harry Lee
Virginia -- Lexington
